stories.text:
We are open to any and all questions about the app and its tech!

Protecting your crypto has never been easier or safer. Gridlock distributes parts of your private key between a group of your friends or 'Guardians' to keep your crypto safe. Your private key is never in one place, making it impossible for you to lose your assets. Wrapped up in an easy mobile app for Android and IOS, you can hold your crypto close and rest assured that it'll never be lost.

For more information, check our documentation: https://bit.ly/3phBii2

Why not try out the app yourself? https://gridlock.page.link/oNWY

Feel free to chat to us on Discord! https://discord.gg/84c7cdHx
stories.title: Show HN: Easy Key splitting to protect your cryptocurrency with Gridlock Wallet
